page.title: 04ONE-WAY SYSTEM
page.content: There has just been a{one_way system} put in{Chapel Road}in{Earith.}The police have changed the two_way street into a one_way system.We decided to interview local people for their{ {opinion}of this. Generally the opinions of the safety on the road was good but several people thought it was a waste of money.{10 people agreed}on the system and{13 people disagreed.} The one_way street was put in to prevent crashes and make it safer for children to walk to school. A white line has been painted on the left hand side of Chapel Road for{pedestrians } and {cyclists }so they can still use the road as normal.{20 people}stated that they thought a pavement should be built instead of a white line to prevent cars colliding with pedestrians. (BY CRAIG and ROBERT aged 11 years.)
